sentences.english: There was no response by the hospital to phone calls on Thursday by The Irrawaddy.
sentences.chinese: 伊洛瓦底雜誌週四就此電話詢問，但醫院沒有迴應。

sentences.english: Htet Aung is the chief reporter of the Election Desk at The Irrawaddy.
sentences.chinese: 本文作者忒昂是選舉服務檯的伊洛瓦底雜誌首席記者。

sentences.english: It still hits down the vast flooded plains of the Irrawaddy delta.
sentences.chinese: 洪水淹沒的伊洛瓦底三角平原瀰漫着屍體的腐臭味。
